comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mary Cora Urquhart Brown Potter (1857-1936), stage actress, married James Brown Potter in 1877; they had a daughter Anne born 1879; they divorced in 1903, but she continued using the name Mrs. James Brown Potter professionally. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cora_Urquhart_Brown-Potter

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research pennylrichardsca. We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
